content: Il cantante e chitarrista blues Robert Johnson avrebbe compiuto 100 anni l'8 maggio 2011 se non fosse morto quando ne aveva 27.
translations: eng:Blues singer and guitarist Robert Johnson would have been 100 years old on May 8th of 2011 if he hadn't died when he was
eng:Blues singer and guitarist Robert Johnson would've been 100 years old on May 8th of 2011 if he hadn't died when he was 2
